33745.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「この扉の向こ:
Beyond this door is the throne room.
In a few moments, Director Dura will be presenting his research results here. You are a traveler, aren't you?
Before the presentation, you should go to the Director's room on the Royal Academy's third floor to seek an audience with Director Dura.
Take the stairs down to the third floor and use the teleportal devices in the Royal Academy to get to the Director's room.

33746.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「この扉の向こ:
Beyond this door is the throne room.
It seems that you have come to see Director Dura's presentation too. Very well. You may enter.

33747.「この上の階の 玉座の間には\n ドルワームを支えている\n 巨大な太陽の石が:
The throne room on the upper floor houses the giant sun stone that supports the Dolworm. The reason for
its location is that the power of the Sun Stone can only be controlled by those of royal blood. If the power of
the Sun Stone should ever go out of control, the King himself will suppress it.

73064.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「なあ 聞いてく:
Hey, listen. I love researching and modifying machines. Especially, I love to play with ancient machines that are
still running today. Ahh... I wonder if there is a cool guy somewhere who would let me modify an ancient
machine!

118082.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この空中庭園に:
The Sky Gardens has a roof, but thanks to research conducted by the Royal Academy of Sciences, it is now
possible to pass through it when using Zoomstone. Amazing, isn't it? We hope you will come and experience the
results of this wonderful Dolworm research.

33748.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私 この空中庭:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I am the caretaker of Sky Gardens. I'm
so happy to work in such a green
place.

33749.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「ドゥラ殿の研究:
I was surprised at your presentation. I had no idea that he could create a sun stone from that miasma-like demon
miasma stone. Anyway, now Dolworm is safe. Now, you too can help me collect demon miasma stones. The bigger the
demon miasma stone, the more rewards you will earn. It seems that everyone else has already headed east to
Calsadora Volcano. Don't be late and regret it.

33750.「本格的に 魔瘴石の収集が\n 始まったようじゃのう。\n<br>\n「あの悪魔:
It seems that the collection of demon miasma stones has begun in earnest. No one would have thought that the demon
stone would replace the sun stone. Master Dura must be the son of God. As proof, before starting this research,
Director Dura received a revelation from God in a dream that he should use the demon miasma stone.

33751.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「私 見ちゃった:
I saw it. Prince Ramiza and researcher Chiri were talking secretly. It was an unusual atmosphere. Love beyond
status, huh? Oh, wow! Romantic!

33752.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「現在 玉座の間:
In the throne room, Lord Dura is in the process of turning the demon miasma stones into solar stones.
Please come and witness this moment of the century!

33753.「魔瘴石が ずいぶん集まったようじゃ。\n 中でも ルナナという者が持ってきた魔:
It seems that demon miasma stones have been collected for a long time. Among them, the demon miasma stone brought
by a man named Lunana was incredibly huge. It seems too big to be a naturally formed demon miasma stone,
but where on earth did he find it?

33754.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「なんということだ…:
What a surprise. Director Dura was being used by the legendary monster Kukulkannibal? Are you and Lord Dura
going to be chased out of Kwaba Luna? Then you should also be concerned about Prince Ramiza. You seem to be
quite skilled. What do you think? Will you go to Boronus Hole and check on him?

33755.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「あの巨大な魔瘴:
I had no idea that the huge demon miasma stone was the one that sealed Kukulkannibal! I thought it was too
big to be a natural demon miasma stone! I should have realized it earlier!

33756.「ドゥラ院長が\n あのラミザ王子の 双子の弟だったなんて……！\n<br>\n:
I can't believe that Director Dura is the twin brother of Prince Ramiza! That's as big a news as Prince Ramiza
and Chiri having a secret meeting!

33757.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「おお！ クァバ:
Oh! Are you the brave warrior who defeated Quabba Luna? Please come to the throne room!
Everyone has been waiting for your return!

33758.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「どうぞ 玉座の:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Please come to the throne room! We've
all been waiting for your return!

33759.「天魔クァバルナは 倒されたようじゃな。\n 目立った被害が 出たわけでもないし:
Kukulkannibal seems to be down. It didn't cause any significant damage, and Director Dura will get off scot-
free. Even though Kukulkannibal was being used by Kwava Luna, there were more sunstones in the end. The end
result was a blessing in disguise.

33760.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ドゥラ院長と:
Director Dura and Prince Ramiza entered the throne room together! It's been a bit vague about Quava Luna, but
the time has finally come for Director Dura to be welcomed as the new prince!

33761.「この国を支えている 太陽の石は\n かがやきを 取り戻しました。\n<br>\:
The stones of the sun that hold this country together have regained their glow. The sun may be fading, but I am
sure that Director Dura will find a way to bring it back.

33762.「今後 クァバルナのような魔物が現れたときは\n ワシの命に代えてでも 国王様を:
If a monster like Quaba Luna appears in the future, I will protect the king even at the cost of my life. You can
continue your journey in peace. By the way, you can now use the train station on the fourth floor of the Crystal
Palace, right? Please make use of it for your journey.

33763.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「この先は 玉:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Beyond this point is the throne room,
where you are always welcome to visit
<pc>.

33764.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「失敗を乗りこえ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Director Dura seems to have grown up a
bit after overcoming his failure. I
look forward to his future activities.

33765.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「<pc>よ 礼:
I thank you, . Thanks to you, the peace of Dolworm has been preserved. I am responsible for the
crisis that has befallen this country. I should never have abandoned my beloved child, no matter what the
reason. This does not absolve me of my sins, but I will make up for them by being more committed to Dolworm's
future than ever before. I will see you again, ! May your future be bright with sunshine!

33766.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「一度は はなれ:
A family that was once separated from each other, but one day joins hands and saves the country. How dramatic!
But if Chiri is the prince's sister, Director Dura's background remains a mystery. Oh no! Very mysterious!

164518.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「なあ 聞いて:
Hey, listen to me. I love researching and modifying various machines. Especially, I can't wait to play with
the ancient machines that are still running today.
